channel.title: Help me texture please

item.title: Help me texture please
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:2, topic:291485”]On the left hand toolbar, there is a button called ‘Map’.
This will help you, when you press it, a little window will appear, there are 4 shapes in that window, select the flat shape.
Then you can move the texture around the model with the move tool in the map window, not just the regular move tool.

P.s. I used that same texture on this model.

[/quote]

Ooh very nice!! Thanks!!

It looks a hell of alot better now!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Help me texture please
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

On the left hand toolbar, there is a button called ‘Map’.
This will help you, when you press it, a little window will appear, there are 4 shapes in that window, select the flat shape.
Then you can move the texture around the model with the move tool in the map window, not just the regular move tool.

P.s. I used that same texture on this model.

Read full topic
